li.label: was melded and feral
li.description: I was trapped as a beast in the same body as another! It was horribly uncomfortable to forget my humanity and I can't look them in the eyes for the things they made us do!

li.label: was a sapient animal
li.description: I was trapped in the body of a beast with another person right next to me! I knew what they were thinking and they knew everything about me...I'm almost traumatised!

li.label: was a mad animal
li.description: I'm sorry! It was the other guy I swear!
